title: Google\Cloud\Channel\V1\Plan
name: Plan
description:
The payment plan for the Offer. Describes how to make a payment.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.channel.v1.Plan

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.payment_plan
params.description: Describes how a reseller will be billed.

params.name: data.payment_type
params.description: Specifies when the payment needs to happen.

params.name: data.payment_cycle
params.description: Describes how frequently the reseller will be billed, such as once per month.

params.name: data.trial_period
params.description: Present for Offers with a trial period. For trial-only Offers, a paid service needs to start before the trial period ends for continued service. For Regular Offers with a trial period, the regular pricing goes into effect when trial period ends, or if paid service is started before the end of the trial period.

methods.description:

params.name: var

methods.name: getTrialPeriod
methods.description:
Present for Offers with a trial period.

For trial-only Offers, a paid service needs to start before the trial period ends for continued service. For Regular Offers with a trial period, the regular pricing goes into effect when trial period ends, or if paid service is started before the end of the trial period.

Generated from protobuf field .google.cloud.channel.v1.Period trial_period = 4;

methods.description:
Present for Offers with a trial period.

For trial-only Offers, a paid service needs to start before the trial period ends for continued service. For Regular Offers with a trial period, the regular pricing goes into effect when trial period ends, or if paid service is started before the end of the trial period.

Generated from protobuf field .google.cloud.channel.v1.Period trial_period = 4;

For trial-only Offers, a paid service needs to start before the trial period ends for continued service. For Regular Offers with a trial period, the regular pricing goes into effect when trial period ends, or if paid service is started before the end of the trial period.
